entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Ingonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ingonish Beach 09:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: NE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
